mapper.select: SELECT M.NO ,M.NAME AS NAME ,M.AUTH_NO ,M.COMPANY_NO ,A.NAME AS AUTHORITY_NAME FROM MEMBER M JOIN AUTHORITY A ON A.NO = M.AUTH_NO WHERE M.COMPANY_NO = #{companyNo} AND M.AUTH_NO != 3

SELECT NO , VACATION_NO , WRITER_NO , FIRST_APPLY_NO , MID_APPLY_NO , LAST_APPLY_NO , CATEGORY_NO , START_TIME , FINISH_TIME , CONTENT , WRITE_DATE , DOCUMENT_DATE , REJECTION FROM VACATION_FORM WHERE WRITER_NO = #{writerNo} AND DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT NO , VACATION_NO , WRITER_NO , FIRST_APPLY_NO , MID_APPLY_NO , LAST_APPLY_NO , CATEGORY_NO , START_TIME , FINISH_TIME , CONTENT , WRITE_DATE , DOCUMENT_DATE , REJECTION FROM VACATION_FORM WHERE CATEGORY_NO = ( SELECT NO FROM DOCUMENT_CATEGORY WHERE NO = 1 ) AND DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT NO , VACATION_NO , WRITER_NO , FIRST_APPLY_NO , MID_APPLY_NO , LAST_APPLY_NO , CATEGORY_NO , START_TIME , FINISH_TIME , CONTENT , WRITE_DATE , DOCUMENT_DATE , REJECTION FROM VACATION_FORM WHERE CATEGORY_NO IN ( SELECT NO FROM DOCUMENT_CATEGORY WHERE NO IN (2, 3) ) AND DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE VACATION_FORM SET CATEGORY_NO = ( SELECT NO FROM DOCUMENT_CATEGORY WHERE NO = 2 ) , DOCUMENT_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE NO = #{no}
